system.description: The character's bionic implants can tap into external power sources to accelerate healing and tissue regeneration.
system.benefit: Once per Game Session when in the presence of a suitable power source, such as a Portable Generator or Regimental Vehicle Power Plant, they can make a +0 Toughness Test as a Full Action. If Successful they remove 1d5 Wounds, +1 per Degree of Success. They cannot remove Critical Damage this way. If they Fail the test, they take 1 Damage, +1 per 3 Degrees of Failure, ignoring Armour and Toughness Bonus.

prerequisites.text: T 45, Potentia Coil Induction, Implanted Potentia or Mechanicus Implants

system.notes: Once per session, requires power source

rollConfig.description: Toughness test to heal from power source

specialAbilities.name: Power-Assisted Healing
specialAbilities.description: Once per session, as Full Action near power source, test Toughness. Success: heal 1d5+DoS Wounds. Failure: take 1 damage +1 per 3 DoF (ignoring armor/toughness).
